description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(650).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,102,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[650], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 08 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 2 x - x^2)/(x^4 - 102 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 18 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,2,101,204]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 102*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 18 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
